collector: trust entity who work on behalf of
text: We provide the information to trusted entities who work on behalf of or with Silverline under strict confidentiality agreements.

* We share information with our clients both prospective and existing under strict confidentiality agreements and ensure adherence to appropriate security standards and safeguards.
If you access our websites on your mobile device, we may also collect your personal information, device information, location details, contact information, network information and other details.
We may share your information in the following circumstances:
We provide the information to trusted entities who work on behalf of or with Silverline under strict confidentiality agreements.
When you provide us with your information or use our websites, we may collect, transfer, store, and process your information.
The collected information about yourself will be used, disclosed, and retained by Silverline as detailed in this privacy notice.
If you access our websites on your mobile device, we may also collect your personal information, device information, location details, contact information, network information and other details.

Silverline only uses cookies in accordance with applicable laws.
Silverline uses cookies to compile aggregate statistics to help us determine areas of preference of a visitor.
We may use automated technologies including the use of web server logs to collect IP addresses, "cookies" and web beacons.

If you access our websites on your mobile device, we may also collect your personal information, device information, location details, contact information, network information and other details.

When you provide information that enables us to respond to your request for products or services, we will, wherever permissible by relevant laws, collect, use, and disclose this information to third parties including clients both prospective and existing ensuring strict confidentiality and adhering to appropriate security standards for the purposes described in this Notice.
When you engage with us through social media sites, you may allow us to have access to certain information from your social media profile based upon your privacy preference settings on such platform.

Silverline also collects information provided by you from our contact us form (e.g., name, mobile number, country) and our careers portal (e.g., name, mobile number, employment information such as resume) on our website.
We may use automated technologies including the use of web server logs to collect IP addresses, "cookies" and web beacons.
If you access our websites on your mobile device, we may also collect your personal information, device information, location details, contact information, network information and other details.
In some instances, Silverline automatically collects personal information pertaining to you when you visit our websites and through email that we may exchange with you.
If we do not provide you with access, we will provide you with the reason for refusal and inform you of any exceptions relied upon.

Silverline may also collect "sensitive" personal information about you when you voluntarily provide this information or where such information is required for us to respond to your request for products or services or permitted to be collected by law or professional standards.
